text: Decree to amend section 23 of the Decree of 16th March, 2922, respecting the contract of employment between natives and civilised employers64 [the following provision is added to § 23 :—" The provincial commissioners may decide that employers shall be bound to provide board and lodging for their employees, notwithstanding any agreement to the contrary."].
